  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805973983</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">3PLUS-U: A Digital Adventure from the International Labour Organization</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">3PLUS-U: Ein Digital Abenteuer von der 
Internationalen Arbeiterorganisation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">3PLUS-U : Une aventure de Digital de 
l'Organisation internationale du travail</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">3PLUS-U: Uma aventura de Digital da 
organização labour internacional</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">3PLUS-U: Un'avventura di Digital 
dall'organizzazione internazionale di Lavoro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">3πλuς-u: Μια ψηφιακή περιπέτεια από το διεθνή
οργανισμό εργασίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">3PLUS-U: Una aventura de Digital de la 
organización de trabajo internacional</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The 3Plus-U site was developed to give you a view of the common concerns shared by millions of people who work. This digital adventure uses maps, games and stories to explore the issues of child labour, forced labour, discrimination and freedom of association in the workplace.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Business</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Site 3Plus-U wurde entwickelt, um Ihnen eine 
Ansicht der geläufigen Interessen zu geben, die von den Millionen 
Leuten geteilt wurden, die arbeiten. Dieses digitale Abenteuer 
verwendet Karten, Spiele und Geschichten, um die Ausgaben der 
Kinderarbeit, der erzwungenen Arbeit, der Unterscheidung und der 
Freiheit der Verbindung an dem Arbeitsplatz zu erforschen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le site 3Plus-U a été développé pour vous 
donner un avis des soucis communs partagés par des millions de 
personnes qui travaillent. Cette aventure digitale emploie des 
cartes, des jeux et des histoires pour explorer les questions du 
travail des enfants, du travail forcé, de la discrimination et de la 
liberté d'association dans le lieu de travail.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O local 3Plus-U foi desenvolvido para dar-lhe uma 
vista dos interesses comuns compartilhados por milhões dos povos que 
trabalham. Esta aventura digital usa mapas, jogos e histórias 
explorar as introduções do trabalho de criança, do trabalho 
forçado, da discriminação e da liberdade da associação no 
workplace.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il luogo 3Plus-U è stato sviluppato per darvi un 
parere delle preoccupazioni comuni condivise da milioni di gente che 
lavora. Questa avventura digitale usa i programmi, giochi e 
storia per esaminare le emissioni del lavoro del bambino, 
lavoro forzato, distinzione e la libertà dell'associazione nel 
posto di lavoro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η περιοχή 3Πλuς-u αναπτύχθηκε για να σας δώσει μια 
όψη των κοινών ανησυχιών κοινών στα εκατομμύρια των ανθρώπων που
εργάζονται. Αυτή η ψηφιακή περιπέτεια χρησιμοποιεί τους 
χάρτες, τα παιχνίδια και τις ιστορίες για να ερευνήσει τα 
ζητήματα της παιδικής εργασίας, της καταναγκαστικής εργασίας, της
διάκρισης και της ελευθερίας του συνδικαλίζεσθαι στον εργασιακό 
χώρο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El sitio 3Plus-U fue desarrollado para darle una 
vista de las preocupaciones comunes compartidas por millones de gente 
que trabaja. Esta aventura digital utiliza correspondencias, 
juegos e historias para explorar las aplicaciones el trabajo de niño,
el trabajo forzado, la discriminación y la libertad de la asociación
en el lugar de trabajo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Affaires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Negócio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Commercio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχείρηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Negocio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

    </metadata>
  </description>
